# Project Overview

This is a cdk-based Python app for the Odin SMR. Managing level 0 data imports. Currently it is notified by S3 events when new data arrives, and triggers processing workflows accordingly.

# Project aims

Provide a cost-effective and scalable solution for processing Level 0 data using AWS services.

# Coding guidelines

- Follow code style enforced by `black` and `ruff`.
- Use type hints and validate with `mypy`.
- Write unit tests using `pytest`.

For detailed setup and development instructions, please refer to our [Development Guide](../README.md).
